title: Progressive Body Scan
description: A guided meditation that helps you relax by systematically focusing on different parts of your body.

steps.title: Preparation
steps.description: Get into a comfortable lying position
steps.instruction: Lie down comfortably on your back.

steps.title: Starting with Feet
steps.description: Focus on your feet and toes
steps.instruction: Bring your attention to your feet.

steps.title: Moving Up
steps.description: Slowly scan up through your body
steps.instruction: Gradually move your attention up through your legs, torso, arms, and head.
